title: BRIEF-Minbos Resources Says New Auger Results Confirm Rare Earth Anomalies
text:
BRIEF-Minbos Resources Says New Auger Results Confirm Rare Earth Anomalies

Commodities 52 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 20:10)

BRIEF-Minbos Resources Says New Auger Results Confirm Rare Earth Anomalies Oct 3 (Reuters) - Minbos Resources Ltd : * NEW AUGER RESULTS CONFIRM 2KM-LONG ZONE OF RARE EARTH ANOMALIES * MINBOS RESOURCES-DRILLING AT AMBARTO RARE EARTH PROJECT, MADAGASCAR CONFIRMED ABOUT 2KM-LONG ZONE OF RARE EARTH SOIL ANOMALIES AT ANKAZOHAMBO PROSPECT

BRIEF-Minbos Resources Says New Auger Results Confirm Rare Earth Anomalies
